Sandwave roadmap

Stay up to date with the latest Sandwave roadmap. Items in the 'Now' status are currently worked on, items in the 'Next' status will be picked up in the next 1 or 2 sprints and for items in the 'Later' status it is our intention to pick them up in the coming 1 to 3 months.

Information about all of our latest releases can be found here.

Now

Integrations

Install Wordpress

Enable customers to easily install Wordpress on their hosting package.

DNS Management

Setup redirects

Enable customers to setup redirects from one domain to another.

Next

Payments

Invoicing service

Creating a service that generates invoices (pdf) based on invoice rules coming from the application.

Later

Labeling system

Ordering of standalone SSL

English translations

Multi-year product purchase

Add a note to a customer

Service Center integration (MVP)

SIDN Domain Registrar Driver and Reseller contact

Contact

Feature-request

Any questions or feature ideas not listed here? Contact our Product Owner.

Recently released

Mail + Spam filter

Integrating a mail and additional spam functionality. Several of the upcoming features depend on this.

Sitebuilder integration

Enable customers to use a sitebuilder for their domain.

Product coupling

Making it possible to offer customers discounts (up to 100%) based on the other subscriptions in their shopping cart.

Laravel LCM

Lifecycle Management on Laravel, taking advantage of both the latest security fixes as well as features.

Upgrade to reseller discounts

Make the self service option available for customers to upgrade to reseller discounts (at a certain monthly fee).

Premium DNS

Integrating with DNS Made Easy to provide customers a premium DNS option.

Product transfers

Enabling customers to transfer products between accounts.
